√dā3 'bind'

present: [6.] dyati etc.   -- dīṣva  

aorist: [5.] adiṣi  

verbal: dita V.+  -dāya S.+  

derivatives: -dātṛ  -dā́na V.+  dā́man V.+  dāmán RV.  -dāya C.  -di AV.  díti? V.+  dīná? V.+  

Not recognized by the native grammarians as separate from the preceding, and of somewhat doubtful character.
